paramInformation.label: Enable Switch of Multilevel Sensor Report
paramInformation.description: Configure arbitrarily to send which sensor values. the sensor values can be selected from humidity, luminance, and temperature

options.label: Humidity disable, luminance disable, temperature disable
Humidity disable, luminance disable, temperature enable
Humidity disable, luminance enable, temperature disable
Humidity disable, luminance enable, temperature enable
Humidity enable, luminance disable, temperature disable
Humidity enable, luminance disable, temperature enable
Humidity enable, luminance enable, temperature disable
Humidity enable, luminance enable, temperature enable

paramInformation.label: Enable Switch of Alarm Notification Report
paramInformation.description: Configure to send which the sensor values arbitrarily. the sensor values can be selected from human detect and open/close

paramInformation.label: Select Switch of Luminance Sensor Scale
paramInformation.description: Configure the luminance sensor scale to either percentage value or lux

paramInformation.label: Set Interval for Multilevel Sensor
paramInformation.description: Configure the sending interval time of the sensor value which is selected by configuration parameter number 1. "0" means especially synchronizing with wake up interval

metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert a CR123A battery and LED blinks.
2. Press the button for over 3 seconds and release.
3. LED turns off when completed.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press the button for over 3 seconds and release.
2. LED blinks when completed.
metadata.reset: Press the button for more than 10 seconds and release.
